text: La Personalidad de Yolandita Monge is the final release under Patty Records by Puerto Rican singer Yolandita Monge and a re-issue of her second studio album A Star is Shining with different artwork and track listing. The album was re- released in the early 1990s by the label Disco Hit in cassette format. It is currently out of print in all media layouts. ==Track listing== {| class="wikitable" |- style="background:#ccc; text-align:center;" !Track !Title !Composer(s) |- | 1 | "No Vale Nada” |Cacho Pomar |- |2 |“Igualdad” |Félix A. Oliver |- |8 |“Un Mundo Nuevo” |Julio Rivera, Cacho Pomar |- |9 |“Que Vida Se Da El Hippie” |Julio Rivera, Cacho Pomar |- |10 |“Amor En El Aire" |D.R. |} ==Notes== *Vocals: Yolandita Monge *Track listing and credits from album cover. *Re-released in Cassette Format by Disco Hit Productions/Aponte Latin Music Distribution (DHC-1623). \---- ==References== Category:Yolandita Monge albums Category:1971 albums
